column1: 78451,russell hobbs rcm12 coffee tea makers,http://www.yebhi.com/online-shopping/appliances.html?affint=home-topmenu,1799,Appliances,coffee-tea-makers,russell-hobbs,http://im6.ybndc.com/upload/78451/ProductRear634776334988477624.jpg,2195,,home and kitchen,http://www.yebhi.com/78451/PD/russell-hobbs-rcm12-coffee-tea-makers.htm,yebhi.com,Russell Hobbs RCM12 - Coffee/Tea Makers Buy Online,Russell Hobbs RCM12 - Coffee/Tea Makers  Best Price Rs 1799.00 Best Discount 18% Off EMI Rs 300 for 6 months FREE Shipping In Stock - Delivery in 6-8 Days,None,<div class="product_detail_columns tinyscrl" itemprop="description" style=""><div class="scrollbar" style="width:2px
column11:
>
Russell Hobbs RCM120 coffee maker has 12 cup capacity; it is right size for a large family. It comes with 1000W of power. It has Permanent filter offers durability and re-usability. It is illuminated on and off switch with light indicator. With a water level indicator and semi transparent water tank which shows exactly how may cups you have left. It has push button swing out filter basket on this coffee maker making fresh coffee simpler. It also has flat holder for coffee pod.
column13:
>1000W
- Swing filter holder
- Non drip valve
- Permanent filter
- Water level scale
- Lighted On/Off switch
-
column14:
>1.25lt capacity ideal for 10~12 cups
- Flat holder for coffee pod
- Semi - transparent water tank
column15:
>

Specification's :
- Capacity : 1.25 Litre
- Material of Filter : Stainless steel
- Anti-drip valve : Yes
- Removable Water Tank : Yes
- Water Indicator/Window : Yes
- Hot Plate : Yes
- Cord storage : Yes
- Power : 1000W

column11:
>
Russell Hobbs RCM1 Coffee Maker 1 Cup Russell Hobbs RCM1 is one cup coffee maker.It has a ceramic cup which is stylish and hygienic. It has 0.125lt capacity and it use 270 W of power. These machines are usually used daily if not multiple times a day to provide a caffeine fix or just to enjoy a nice cup of black coffee. It has permanent filter which is durable and reusable. Its pull out filter makes cleaning easy.
column12:
>
